data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Mazatlan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 3, Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of America.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
In Mexico City Mazatlan attack through Efrain Velarde. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 6, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards America a goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, America have a goal kick.
Throw-in America.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a throw-in for America, close to Mazatlan's area.
America's Sebastian Cordova breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
America have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in America.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of America.
Important block from the Mazatlan defence as Sebastian Cordova fires in a strike for America.
In the minute 21, In Mexico City, Miguel Sansores (Mazatlan) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 23, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Mazatlan throw-in in America's half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to America.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Attention is being given to Americaâ€™s Federico Vinas and play has been suspended briefly.
America's Federico Vinas is back in action after a slight knock.
Martin Rodriguez for Mazatlan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Mazatlan needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 27, Mazatlan have a goal kick.
America to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
Can Mazatlan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside America's half?
In the minute 29, Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio Azteca.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 31, America have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 32, Jose Ortiz (Mazatlan) gets a yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
At Estadio Azteca, America are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 35, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mazatlan's Efrain Velarde gets his shot away but it misses the target.
America have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Rodrigo Millar (Mazatlan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Mexico City, Martin Rodriguez of Mazatlan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
In the minute 38, Mazatlan's Cesar Huerta breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 42, Free kick America.
Aldo Rocha (Mazatlan) has received a yellow card from Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
America's Henry Martin has run offside.
In the minute 45, America will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Mazatlan.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to America in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Mexico City.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio Azteca.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
In the minute 46, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
The home team have replaced Sebastian Cordova with Nicolas Benedetti. This is the first substitution made today by Miguel Herrera.
In the minute 47, Goal! Henry Martin gives America a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Jorge Sanchez to set up the goal.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards America a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Rodrigo Millar of Mazatlan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal for Mazatlan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 52, America push forward at Estadio Azteca and Henry Martin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Mazatlan defence.
Throw-in Mazatlan.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Own goal! Aldo Rocha scores in his own net to make it 2-0.
Free kick for America in the half of Mazatlan.
Richard Sanchez puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of America.
Mazatlan make their first substitution with Camilo Sanvezzo replacing Luis Mendoza.
In the minute 59, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Camilo Sanvezzo of Mazatlan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nicolas Benedetti for America has been booked by Eduardo Galvan Basulto and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
In the minute 60, Rodrigo Millar gets his shot on target but fails to score for Mazatlan.
America have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Richard Sanchez's header is off-target for America.
In the minute 61, Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Mazatlan's Aldo Rocha gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Azteca. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Mexico City, Camilo Sanvezzo (Mazatlan) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 64, Mario Osuna is replacing Rodrigo Millar for the away team.
Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Antonio Lopez Amenabar is replacing Alonso Escoboza for America at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in America territory.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards America a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to America.
In the minute 68, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
In the minute 70, Roger Martinez is on a sub for Henry Martin for America.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Mazatlan are back in the match in Mexico City. Camilo Sanvezzo has scored to make it 3-1.
In the minute 72, Cesar Huerta instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick Mazatlan.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 75, Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
The away team replace Cesar Huerta with Jorge Valdivia.
In the minute 76, Mazatlan make their fourth substitution with Fernando Aristeguieta replacing Miguel Sansores.
Free kick in a good position for Mazatlan!
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Mazatlan close to the penalty box.
Mazatlan are coming forward and Camilo Sanvezzo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mazatlan pushes forward through Fernando Aristeguieta, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 83, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a America throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
In the minute 84, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Santiago Caseres is replacing Richard Sanchez for the home team.
Miguel Herrera (America) is making a fifth substitution, with Luis Reyes replacing Federico Vinas.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Mazatlan are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 87, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Mazatlan in Mexico City.
Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Mazatlan close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Mazatlan in Mexico City.
At Estadio Azteca the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Mazatlan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside America's half?
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick America.
America have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Azteca.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
